column3: Latest;Battambang:------Â The bodies of a family of five people who were killed on the site of a construction collapse have been returned to families for a traditional funeral.------They were named as:------30-year-old Seang Soeung (husband).------22-year-old Tevy (wife)------26-year-old Rachna Selay
column5: (brother)------7-year-old Soeung Soth (child).------3-month-old Srey Sreyna (child).------All five were from Snuol Kang village
